answers.answer: I have gd too and my doctor never told me what it has to bee. Mine was 239 the other day. But I felt fine. And I'm not on insulin they are just having me watch my diet and try and keep my blood sugar down..

question: I'm 33 weeks pregnant and have gestational diabetes and my surgar was 259 so I did my bed time insulin of 6 units. How high does your surgar have to be before you seek medical help even with being on insulin?
title: GD at 33 weeks
